summary: Tina discovered a new house! She believes it\'s the lost palace of Blackrun.
descriptionHtml:
BLACKRUN

Tina discovered a new house! She believes it\'s the lost palace of Blackrun.

Whiterun has not always been a peaceful place. Legends say that in the early days of the empire, a tyran ruled over the planes of Skyrim.
Having enslaved many villagers he ordered them to build a temple in his honnor in the middle of the land, a soar for all to see! 
The king himself was afraid of him but when the peolple united and the tyran was vanquished, the king ordered to burry the palace so it would be forgotten forever.
It took hurdreds of years but the people finally forgot about the story and the city ironically called Whiterun, wich was built over it, is now a prosper place.

Tina says it\'s in very good condition none the less. You should come check it out!

UPDATE 1.1
-It\'s a fine day with you around...
Tina just got back from the ApachiiSkyHair Salon, and she is flamboyant!

-That darn cat...
One of those cat people found a way inside the house, he says his name is Mittens... Fool! Good thing he has supplies. His wealth might come in handy in the long run.



LOCATION
Under Whiterun right next to the Chillfurrow Farm.



CONTENT
-Tina (follower)
-smithing area (skyforge)
-study (enchanting and alchemy gear)
-kitchen
-bathing room
-guest room
-master bedroom
-18 mannequins and their funky poses
-45 weapon racks
-20 weapon plaques
-display cases
-dragon mask busts
-shrines
-bookshelves
-storage
-ores
-harvestables
UPDATE 1.1
-ApachiiHair for Tina
-Mittens (24h general vendor)
-rocks 
-minor clutter (rug, books...)
-added missing ember in front
-switched banners facing backwards  
UPDATE 1.2
-added FaceGenData folder (meshes folder)


****I\'m done! comment and endorse!****



REQUIREMENTS

ApachiiSkyHair  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168


** Empty house and uninstall (or delete esp) before updating

INSTALLATION

place content in Data folder, activate, run the game!


THANKYOU

Bethesda, Skyrim is awesome!

Eldiabs, for your resource mod!

Apachii, for the great hairstlyes!

The modding comunity, Skyrim is awesomer!


NOTE

1st mod :D
I have no clue what I\'m doing!!!
I probably won\'t update this but may make other ones...
author: madmax2198
